Date:           12 Jun 90 13:03:49 GMT

My favorite "Heron-type" formula is Brahmagupta's formula for the
maximum area of a quadrilateral:

		KK = (s - a)(s - b)(s - c)(s - d)

Does *this* have n-dimensional analogues?
